newsitem.title: USA: PG&E Diablo Canyon nuke rate debate begins.
newsitem.headline: PG&E Diablo Canyon nuke rate debate begins.

text.p: The formal debate over how much more Pacific Gas & Electric Co (PG&E) will be able to charge customers to cover its investment in the Diablo Canyon nuclear power plant began this week in San Francisco.
Hearings on the rate case will continue into next week before an administrative law judge at the California Public Utilities Commission (CPUC).
PG&E in March filed with the CPUC to accelerate depreciation of Diablo Canyon starting in 1997 in return for accepting a reduced return on its investment.
